story_title: Columbus's Risky Voyage: A New World Awaits
original_story: [excited] You won’t believe this—in 1492, Columbus set sail with just three ships! He aimed for Asia but stumbled upon the Caribbean instead. Imagine the surprise when he landed in what he thought was India! His arrival sparked an era of exploration and cultural exchange that reshaped history. By 1493, his return voyage shocked Europe with tales of gold and new lands. This one journey ignited a global curiosity that led to centuries of exploration. Who knew a wrong turn could change the world? [pause:1s]
